channel.title: Max Boll - Web-Developer - Speedcuber - MyXoToD.com
channel.description: Max Boll, Frontend and Backend Web-Developer from Mayence

item.title: My personal review of 2k13
item.description: I feel inspired by Kevin to write an article about my life in 2013. A lot of things happened and I can't wait to wrap them together and tell you.

item.title: dotJS 2013
item.description: It's been a while since my last development conference. I was lucky to get one of the last super-late bird tickets for the dotJS conference in Paris, France. As it predicts, it's all about javascript and similar web-technologies. Tim and I have teamed up and went to Paris together to meet Lucas for the first time and of course to go to that conference.

item.title: Deploy Jekyll via Rakefile
item.description: Your website is built of Jekyll? Your server doesn't support Ruby? Therefore you can't host you site? Well, exactly this was my case. I found a gem called Capistrano, which is for website deployment but this thing seemed just too big for my needs. Anyway, I managed to push this Jekyll website on my server with just a single command. This is how I did it.

item.title: New design online
item.description: The recent weeks I struggeled with a couple of new designs for my website. I started work for version 9 of MyXoToD.com and at first I was really satisfied but after some days I kicked the whole thing right into the bin.
